meanings.definition: A drug used to treat Parkinson's disease and certain types of flu.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed amantadine to help with my Parkinson's symptoms.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended amantadine for my flu symptoms.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook amantadine for candy and almost ate it!
meanings.sent4: Amantadine is like a superhero fighting off the flu villains in my body.
meanings.sent5: The tiny amantadine pill packs a powerful punch against the flu.

meanings.definition: To treat with the drug amantadine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will amantadine my flu symptoms to help me recover faster.
meanings.sent2: I amantadined my Parkinson's disease with the medication as per the doctor's instructions.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally amantadined my headache instead of taking the right medicine!
meanings.sent4: She gently amantadined the patient's symptoms away with care and precision.
meanings.sent5: The medication amantadines the illness, bringing relief and comfort to the patient.
